data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Beard, Jennifer J., Seeman, Owen D., Bauchan, Gary R. (2014): Tenuipalpidae (Acari: Trombidiformes) from Casuarinaceae (Fagales). Zootaxa 3778 (1): 1-157, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3778.1.1
